mapper.select: SELECT IDX, MENU_ID, TITLE, CONT, WRITER, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'HH24:MI') WHEN TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') THEN TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'MM.DD') ELSE TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'YY.MM.DD') END AS REGDATE, READCOUNT, BNUM, LVL, STEP, NREF, DELNUM, PARENT FROM BOARD ORDER BY IDX DESC
SELECT TITLE, CONT, REGDATE FROM BOARD WHERE IDX = #{ idx }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD( IDX, MENU_ID, TITLE, CONT, WRITER, READCOUNT, BNUM, LVL, STEP, NREF, DELNUM, PARENT ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(IDX), 0)+1 FROM BOARD), 'MENU01', #{ title }, #{ cont }, 'TESTER', 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 )
